com.netflix.governator.guice

Class Grapher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.governator.guice.Grapher

  • public class Grapher
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that can generate a graph showing a Guice Dependency Injection graph.
    See Also:
    GraphViz, Guice Grapher, XDot, an interactive viewer for Dot files
